name: api-fort
description: The treefort public API hosted on AWS Lambda.

scripts.deploy:api-gateway: aws apigateway put-rest-api --rest-api-id 7n74ikdn58 --mode overwrite --body 'file://./src/api-gateway/TreefortAPI-dev-swagger.json'; aws apigateway create-deployment --rest-api-id 7n74ikdn58 --stage-name dev
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:events; npm run deploy:performers; npm run deploy:playlists; npm run deploy:venues; npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:events: zip -j events-api.zip ./src/events-api.js aws; lambda update-function-code --function-name eventsAPI --zip-file fileb://events-api.zip
scripts.deploy:performers: zip -j performers-api.zip ./src/performers-api.js; aws lambda update-function-code --function-name performersAPI --zip-file fileb://performers-api.zip
scripts.deploy:playlists: pushd src; zip -r ../playlists-api.zip ./playlists-api.js ./lib ./controllers ../node_modules; popd; aws lambda update-function-code --function-name playlistsAPI --zip-file fileb://playlists-api.zip
scripts.deploy:venues: zip -j venues-api.zip ./src/venues-api.js; aws lambda update-function-code --function-name venuesAPI --zip-file fileb://venues-api.zip

author: bdietz, junger, bernhardtgl
